TrapDoorID.description:
Sends all non-flying brutes down a floor. Once opened, stays open unless blocked by a spider.
Have a Fall

ReuseTrapDoorID.description:
Sends all non-flying brutes down a floor. Opens every so often, unless blocked by a spider.
Feeling Lucky?

TarID.description:
Slows all non-flying brutes by 50%.
Walk, don't run.

PoisonID.description:
Poisons brutes, dealing damage over time.
Suffocate

ArrowID.description:
Range is the entire floor.
Shoots arrows at things

LightningID.description:
Deals lightning damage to all brutes in range.
You'll be Shocked

FlameVentID.description:
Deals fire damage to all brutes in range.
Hot enough to melt steel

HighBladeID.description:
Deals heavy damage to all non-flying brutes in range.
Where's Your Head?
